duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the operation and maintenance of all electrical, mechanical, life safety, and monitoring equipment within the Data Center/Facility.
Problem solve and drive root cause analyses.
Work effectively and collaboratively in a team environment.
Work unsupervised and maintain facility appearance and integrity.
Accessing and managing Work Permits and Risk Assessments.
Provide FANATICAL support and work a flexible schedule.
Be knowledgeable in Health and Safety at work acts, method statements, and risk assessments.

education_certification.credential: 0-1 year plus experience with the electrical, mechanical, life safety and monitoring equipment maintenance within data center or other critical environments.
